    • Extensions

    Settings

    • Appearance

      Title
      Background
      Visibility
      Opacity: 100%

    • Search

    • Tabs

    Set up search engines

    You can add, remove and rearrange search engines.
    Names must be unique.
    Url must match pattern:http(s)://[site name]?[query name]=

    Set up tabs

    You can add, remove and rearrange tabs.
    Names must be unique.
    Source must match one of the following pattern:
    • recent - recently closed tabs
    • top - top sites
    • bookmark:[folder](/[folder])* - path to bookmark folder. For example: bookmark:path/to my/bookmarks
    cols:rows:

    Set default options?

    This action will set up default options and reload the tab.

    Search
